title: Failing to learn, learning to fail (TEFC)
creator_credit: Mike Gavin, Films Incorporated and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: Investigates the relationship between learning disabilities and delinquent behaviour by examining the history of four youngsters afflicted with minimal brain dysfunction. Points out the importance of early diagnosis and reports on the progress being made in the treatment of this disorder.
